author: Markus Spring
content:
Yes, having not to care for anything is great (do they backup? I guess, but...) and stability is more than good enough. Flexibility is not so much a strong point, but for a blogging purposes again good enough. And the not completely easy feelings I have with google regarding their omnipresence and the reunification of personal traces left everywhere on the web is probably only a very personal thing.

So I am looking forward to your new website.
